head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LIVERANCE, WALLACE B., JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LIVERANCE, WALLACE B., JR.

block.p: LIVERANCE--Wallace B., Jr., on Tuesday, April 27, 2004. Beloved husband of Martha E. (Ochoa) of Ringwood, formerly of Ridgewood. Loving father of Wallace B. III, Alan R., Howard M., William R., David A. Liverance and Martha E. Rowe. Grandfather of five. Predeceased by a son, Howard William, and a brother, Melville P. Liverance. Services are private. Information: Richards Funeral Home, 1440 Union Valley Rd., West Milford, NJ.
